title: Beautiful Serifs
content:
Hi everyone,

I have attached a few beautiful serif typefaces that I require the names of.  
I apologise for the scan as it was scanned from a reproduction of the actual  
original design. They were both from the Cahan & Associates book ‘I Am Almost Always Hungry’.  
If anyone can help, much appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [serif\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=serif_1.jpg) | 64.55 KB |
| [serif\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=serif_2.jpg) | 85.91 KB |
author: apparatus™

comments.content:
Thanks Marc, greatly appreciated!  
Definately classics!
